original_text:
**Solution Outline**  
To address this, we will enhance the existing churn pipeline by integrating an *upsell candidate score*.
units:
* * Solution Outline * *  
 To address this , we will enhance the existing churn pipeline by integrating an * upsell candidate score * .

original_text: This score will be derived using new features such as recent spend delta (month-over-month changes) and feature adoption velocity (rate of product usage growth).
units: This score will be derived using new features such as recent spend delta ( month - over - month changes ) and feature adoption velocity ( rate of product usage growth ) .
using new features such as recent spend delta ( month - over - month changes )
feature adoption velocity ( rate of product usage growth )
